name: SourceBans-Fork
tagline: Global admin, ban, and communication management system for the Source engine
body:
# Latest Release
## [1.5.2F](https://github.com/Sarabveer/SourceBans-Fork/archive/1.5.2F.zip) - [Changelog](https://github.com/Sarabveer/SourceBans-Fork/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)

# About
### SourceBans-Fork is a modified version of SourceBans 1.4.11 by [GameConnect](http://www.gameconnect.net/).
It includes many community customizations and modifications to make the SourceBans experience better.

# Links
### [SourceBans Fork - AlliedModders](https://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?t=263735)
### [SourceBans FAQ](https://sarabveer.github.io/SourceBans-Fork/faq/)
### [SourceBans Forums - AlliedModders](https://forums.alliedmods.net/forumdisplay.php?f=152)
